mapper.select: SELECT /* EmpInfoDAO.selectEmpInfoAll */ '0' AS CHK , EMP_CODE , EMP_NAME , RESIDENT_NUMBER , BIRTH_DATE , GENDER , TEL , PHONE_NUMBER , NATIVE_TYPE_CODE , EMAIL , HIGHEST_EDUCATION_CODE , BASE_ADDRESS , DETAIL_ADDRESS , ZIP_CODE , IMG_SRC , DISABILITY_CODE FROM EMPLOYEE_INFO ORDER BY EMP_CODE

SELECT /* EmpInfoDAO.findEmpInfoList */ EMP_CODE , EMP_NAME , RESIDENT_NUMBER , BIRTH_DATE , GENDER , TEL , PHONE_NUMBER , NATIVE_TYPE_CODE , EMAIL , HIGHEST_EDUCATION_CODE , BASE_ADDRESS , DETAIL_ADDRESS , ZIP_CODE , IMG_SRC , DISABILITY_CODE FROM EMPLOYEE_INFO WHERE EMP_CODE = #{empCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE_INFO SET EMP_NAME=#{empName}, RESIDENT_NUMBER=#{residentNumber}, BIRTH_DATE='19'||SUBSTR(RESIDENT_NUMBER,0,4), GENDER=#{gender}, IMG_SRC=#{imgSrc}, ZIP_CODE=#{zipCode}, BASE_ADDRESS=#{baseAddress}, DETAIL_ADDRESS=#{detailAddress}, EMAIL=#{email}, TEL=#{tel}, PHONE_NUMBER=#{phoneNumber}, HIGHEST_EDUCATION_CODE=#{highestEducationCode}, NATIVE_TYPE_CODE=#{nativeTypeCode}, DISABILITY_CODE=#{disabilityCode} WHERE EMP_CODE=#{empCode}
